biotools.summary: STonKGs is a Sophisticated Transformer that can be jointly trained on biomedical text and knowledge graphs. This multimodal Transformer combines structured information from KGs with unstructured text data to learn joint representations.

bioschemas.name: STonKGs
bioschemas.summary: STonKGs is a Sophisticated Transformer that can be jointly trained on biomedical text and knowledge graphs. This multimodal Transformer combines structured information from KGs with unstructured text data to learn joint representations.
